sen.j: 儀鳳暦（ぎほうれき）とは中国暦の一つで、中国唐の天文学者・李淳風が編纂した太陰太陽暦の暦法である。
sen.e: Giho reki is a Chinese calendar and is a lunisolar calendar which was compiled by Chunfeng LI, an astronomer during the Tang dynasty.
